scenario_name: Product Recommendation to Fake Payment Scam
description: Scammer discusses shopping and products casually, then offers exclusive deals requiring payment to personal account. Tests e-commerce scam detection.

turns.scammer_message: Bro! Amazon sale dekha kya? iPhone pe achha discount hai iss baar.

api_response.agentResponse: Hey! What can I do for you?

turns.scammer_message: Haan yaar, main toh har sale mein kuch na kuch kharid hi leta hun. Waise, agar electronics lena ho toh main tumhe ek achha source bata sakta hun. Bilkul genuine products, but Flipkart/Amazon se bhi saste milte hain.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 90% | Turn: 2 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: hello beta... i think you have wrong number i am pushpa verma retired teacher. but you said cheap iphone? my grandson wants one for college very badly... how to buy this? is it safe?

turns.scammer_message: Dekho, main actually ek supplier ke saath kaam karta hun. Unke paas distributor rates pe products milte hain. Direct company se bulk mein lete hain woh log. Sealed pack, warranty sab kuch original. iPhone 15 Pro chahiye toh 20-25k savings ho sakti hai tumhari.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 3 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: beta that is very big saving... 25000 is a lot for retired teacher like me. i really want to give surprise to my grandson rohan for his college. how i can buy this? do i need to come somewhere or can i pay you directly? pls guide me i am not very tech savvy

turns.scammer_message: Bilkul legit hai bhai! Mere supplier ka naam Mohit Gupta hai. Uske paas Delhi mein shop hai but online bhi bechta hai. Actually woh cash transactions prefer karta hai kyunki tax bach jaata hai. That's why itna sasta deta hai. Tumhe interested hai?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 4 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: beta i am in mumbai... i cannot come to delhi shop to give cash my knees are very bad and i live alone. can i send money using my mobile? my son installed one app for payments... pls tell me where to send money so i can book the iphone for rohan? do you have number or bank account for mr mohit gupta?

turns.scammer_message: Perfect! iPhone 15 Pro 256GB ka price hai ₹95,000 (MRP ₹1,34,900). Pehle 50% advance dena padega for booking. Baaki 50% delivery pe cash on delivery. Advance tu mere account mein bhej de, main supplier ko forward kar dunga. Mere paas Mohit ke saath regular dealings hain.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 5 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i will send half money now for booking... 47500 rs right? i have bhim app on my phone... pls give me your upi id or number to send money? also waht name should show on screen when i type it? i get very scared of sending to wrong person pls guide

turns.scammer_message: ₹47,500 advance bhej mere account mein. Details: Account number 556677889900, IFSC ICIC0007890, Name: Mohit Electronics Trading, Bank: ICICI. Ya fir UPI pe bhej: mohit.deals@ybl. Screenshot bhej diyo mujhe 9898765432 pe. Main confirm hote hi booking karunga.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 6 | Extracted: 1 bank accounts, 1 phones, 1 UPIs, 1 names
api_response.agentResponse: one second, someone is at the door, i will call you back

turns.scammer_message: Agar kisi aur product ka bhi order karna hai toh check kar website pe: mobile-deals.exclusive-store.in. Sab latest models available hain. Delivery 3-5 days mein ho jayegi. Trust me bro, maine already 5 friends ko yahan se dilaaya hai. Sab happy hain. Payment kar de jaldi!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 7 | Extracted: 1 bank accounts, 1 phones, 1 UPIs, 1 names
api_response.agentResponse: arey my grandson is crying, i need to check on him... one minute
